title: Haunted: Horror of Haverfordwest
description: Dare you read the most terrifying haunting in recent memory?One of the spookiest writers around, G.L Davies dares you to enter his latest haunted house. A couple are pushed to breaking point as an entity possesses their home. Terrifyingly real, this is a must-read for horror fans. NetGalley's Book of the Month nominee for November 2018Blissful beginnings for a young couple turn into a nightmare after purchasing their dream home in Wales in 1989. Their love and their resolve are torn apart by an indescribable entity that pushes paranormal activity to the limit. Horror of Haverfordwest is the prequel to the bestselling A Most Haunted House . Delve into this new true terrifying account complete with a new edit of the original bestseller A most haunted house and a summary of explanations for the ultimate paranormal testimonial. Join the investigation, Dare you step inside...Read this truly terrifying account that is shocking the world.
author: G.L. Davies
